tool_description: Analyzes RBAC configurations to detect and report permission conflicts, overlapping assignments, and potential security vulnerabilities in role and permission structures.

analysis_scope.description: Scope of conflict analysis: user_specific, role_specific, system_wide

target_id.description: Specific user or role ID when scope is user_specific or role_specific

conflict_types.description: Types of conflicts to check for

error_messages: Invalid analysis scope: Use one of [user_specific, role_specific, system_wide].
Target ID required: Specify target_id when using user_specific or role_specific scope.
Target not found: The specified target_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid conflict type: One or more specified conflict types are not recognized.
usage: Run conflict detection by specifying analysis_scope and conflict_types. Provide target_id when analyzing specific users or roles.

analysis_id.description: Unique identifier for this conflict analysis

affected_users.description: Number of users affected by conflicts
